    .green {color: #207f4c;} /* Mint Green */

# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version      | Supported                      |
| ------------ | ------------------------------ |
| &lt; v0.3.*  | <p class="red">FALSE</p>       |
| other        | <p class="green">TRUE</p>      |
